程序包 <Unnamed>

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CardGame
    An interface for a general card game.
    CardGameTable
    An interface for a general card game table (GUI)
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AnimationPanel
    To show the animation of distributing cards
    BigTwo
    This class is used to model a Big Two card game.
    BigTwoCard
    This class is a subclass of the Card class, and is used to model a card used in a Big Two card game.
    BigTwoConsole
    This class is used for modeling a console for the Big Two card game.
    BigTwoDeck
    This is used to model a deck of cards used in a Big Two card game
    BigTwoTable  
    Card
    This class is used for representing a card in general card games.
    CardGameLauncher  
    CardGamePlayer
    This class is used to represent a player in general card games.
    CardList
    This class is used to represent a list of cards.
    Deck
    This class is used to represent a deck of cards in general card games.
    Flush
    This is used to model a hand of Flush.
    FullHouse
    This is used to model a hand of FullHouse.
    Hand
    This class is used to model a hand of cards, and contains methods for getting the player of this hand, checking if it is a valid hand, getting the type of this hand, getting the top card of this hand, and checking if it beats a specified hand.
    Pair
    This is used to model a hand of Pair.
    Quad
    This is used to model a hand of Quad.
    Single
    This is used to model a hand of Single.
    Straight
    This is used to model a hand of Straight.
    StraightFlush
    This is used to model a hand of Straight Flush.
    Tester
    This class is used to test a Big Two card game.
    Triple
    This is used to model a hand of Triple.
